permissionType.description: Defines whether this is an ALLOW or DENY type of permission.

permissionString.description: Machine-parseable string representing an individual permission. It can be any arbitrary string as long as the authorization code can make use of it in the context of user permission matching.

groupVisibility.description: Optional group visibility identifier of the Permission.

virtualNode.description: Optional identifier of the virtual node within which the physical node permission applies to.
